about_the_game:
Crane Logistics Simulator

Crane Logistics Simulator is a realistic crane simulator where you earn money by making Deliveries and grow your own logistics network.

Load Containers on Ships by Crane. and Safely deliver Containers to your customers.
Grow your logistics network by purchasing more ships.
You can serve your customers from other ports or from your own ports. Serving in other ports requires a large Harbor Crane and you have to transport the Harbor Crane with Trucks and install it together with Cranes. However, small cranes will work for the deliveries you will make from your own ports.

Larger deliveries may require more ships! Remember, bigger deliveries mean bigger rewards and money!

Crane Logistics Simulator Offers You The Most Realistic Crane Simulation Experience!

Crane Logistics Simulator

You can serve your customers from other ports or from your own ports. Serving in other ports requires a large Harbor Crane and you have to transport the Harbor Crane with Trucks and install it together with Cranes. However, small cranes will work for the deliveries you will make from your own ports.

Larger deliveries may require more ships! Remember, bigger deliveries mean bigger rewards and money!
